text: Andreas Kristoffer Nordvik (born 18 March 1987) is a Norwegian footballer who plays as a centre-back for Byåsen Toppfotball. He is renowned for having equally good left and right foot ability, good speed and being a tough defensive player. ==Career== Nordvik signed with Danish club FC Fredericia in February 2018,FC FREDERICIA HENTER NORSK FORSVARSFORSTÆRKNING‚ fcfredericia.dk, 13 February 2018 but left the club again, as he signed with Odd in August 2018. After the 2018 season Odds BK announced, that Nordvik alongside 2 other players, would leave the club.Tre spillere forlater Odd, odd.no, 19 November 2018 On 7 June 2019, Nordvik joined Byåsen Toppfotball.Tidligere RBK-spiller trapper ned og flytter hjem: – Jeg kunne fortsatt i utlandet, eurosport.no, 7 June 2019 ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Rosenborg BK *Norwegian Premier League Championship:
